flow.descriptionCdata:
36610efd-d00e-4c51-8e26-8783326a1203.cd6c1b30-8e0b-4885-9ca3-a8ddc19d964d.description=
This subflow was created by the Web Services Wizard to invoke the NDFDgen operation on http\://graphical.weather.gov/xml/SOAP_server/ndfdXMLserver.php?wsdl. Note that the inputs to this flow which correspond to web service inputs are optional inputs.  This is due to the fact that web services definitions usually incorrectly indicate that too many inputs are required, and mirroring those settings in the flow would force you to enter unused values when running the flow.  The xmlTemplate input on the Invoke Method 2 step of this flow contains a template of the xml message to be sent, and the fields preceded by the comment "<\!--Optional\:-->" or "<\!--zero or more repetitions-->" are those which the web service indicates are optional; all others are indicated to be required.

Inputs\:
    webserviceHost - The host that is running the web service
    webservicePort - The port on the host running the web service
    headers - The list containing the headers to use for the request separated by new line (CRLF).The header name - value pair will be separated by "\:".
Format\: Conforming with HTTP standard for headers (RFC 2616).
Examples\: Accept-Language\:en
    proxy - The port on the host running the web service.
    proxyPort - A port on the proxy to connect to.
    NDFDgen.Unit - The input named NDFDgen|Unit of the complex type\: NDFDgen
    NDFDgen.endTime - The input named NDFDgen|endTime of the complex type\: NDFDgen
    NDFDgen.latitude - The input named NDFDgen|latitude of the complex type\: NDFDgen
    NDFDgen.longitude - The input named NDFDgen|longitude of the complex type\: NDFDgen
    NDFDgen.product - The input named NDFDgen|product of the complex type\: NDFDgen
    NDFDgen.startTime - The input named NDFDgen|startTime of the complex type\: NDFDgen
    NDFDgen.weatherParameters.appt - The input named NDFDgen|weatherParameters|appt of the complex type\: NDFDgen|weatherParameters

    NDFDgen.weatherParameters.wdir_r - The input named NDFDgen|weatherParameters|wdir_r of the complex type\: NDFDgen|weatherParameters

    NDFDgen.weatherParameters.wx - The input named NDFDgen|weatherParameters|wx of the complex type\: NDFDgen|weatherParameters

Results\:
    document - The raw XML response of the web service
    documentStripped - The XML response of the web service stripped of namespaces
    responseHeaders - The list containing the headers of the response message, separated by newline.
Format\: This is conforming with HTTP standard for headers (RFC 2616).
Example\: Content-Type\: text/xml;charset\=utf-8
               Transfer-Encoding\: chunkedWebServiceWizard.repo.successDesc\=The SOAP command was accepted by the web service
    dwmlOut - The output given by the XPath\: /Envelope/Body/NDFDgenResponse/dwmlOut/text()

Responses\:
    success - The SOAP command was accepted by the web service
    failure - Something went wrong while making the SOAP request
flow.name: Get Forecast
